1. Aries - 6/10 - Impulsive and emotional, Aries can struggle to articulate their thoughts clearly in a concise manner.
2. Taurus - 8/10 - Practical and grounded, Taurus' clear and logical thinking makes them excellent at conveying their ideas effectively.
3. Gemini - 9/10 - Quick-witted and communicative, Geminis are natural storytellers and can easily convey complex information in an engaging way.
4. Cancer - 5/10 - Emotional and empathetic, Cancers may struggle to separate personal feelings from the message they're trying to convey, leading to ambiguity.
5. Leo - 8/10 - Confident and charismatic, Leos' natural flair for drama can make their messages engaging and memorable, but may also lead to exaggeration.
6. Virgo - 7/10 - Analytical and detail-oriented, Virgos are thorough in their communication, but may come across as overly critical or pedantic at times.
7. Libra - 9/10 - Diplomatic and balanced, Libras' natural talent for compromise and fairness makes them excellent mediators and communicators.
8. Scorpio - 6/10 - Passionate and intense, Scorpios can be bluntly honest to a fault, which may lead to misunderstandings or hurt feelings if not tempered with tact.

9. Sagittarius - 7/10 - Optimistic and enthusiastic, Sagittarians are natural motivators and can convey their ideas with infectious energy, but may also come across as too vague or idealistic at times.
10. Capricorn - 6/10 - Disciplined and responsible, Capricorns' serious demeanor can make them appear aloof or unapproachable if they don't balance their communication with warmth and empathy.

11. Aquarius - 8/10 - Humanitarian and innovative, Aquarians are natural visionaries who can convey complex ideas in a clear and compelling manner, but may struggle to connect emotionally with others.
12. Pisces - 4/10 - Dreamy and imaginative, Pisces' fluid thinking can make their messages unclear or confusing if not grounded in reality.
